Package io.micronaut.cache.hazelcast

@Configuration @Requires(property="hazelcast.enabled", notEquals="false") package io.micronaut.cache.hazelcast
Classes related to the integration of Hazelcast caches into Micronaut's cache manager.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    io.micronaut.cache
    Contains cache interfaces and implementations in Micronaut.
    io.micronaut.cache.hazelcast.condition
     
    io.micronaut.cache.hazelcast.converters
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    HazelcastAsyncCache
    A AsyncCache implementation based on Hazelcast.
    HazelcastCacheManager
    A CacheManager implementation for Hazelcast.
    HazelcastClientConfiguration
    Configuration class for an Hazelcast as a client.
    HazelcastFactory
    Factory class that creates a HazelcastInstance.
    HazelcastMemberConfiguration
    Configuration class for an Hazelcast as a member.
    HazelcastSyncCache
    A SyncCache implementation based on Hazelcast.
